snippet: The news this week that criminal charges were nearing against a French bank and a Swiss bank received a mixed reaction from a public weary over the mantra that Wall Street is “too big to jail.”
abstract: The news this week that criminal charges were nearing against a French bank and a Swiss bank received a mixed reaction from a public weary over the mantra that Wall Street is “too big to jail.”

headline.main: Weekend Reading: Targeting Big Banks. No, Not Those Big Banks.
